Service Details: Offers physiotherapy services that include: comprehensive injury care; sports physiotherapy; WCB injury management; ICBC and whiplash recovery; acupuncture and IMS; massage; vestibular rehabilitation; pre/post surgical care; nutrition; bracing and taping; and athletic screening
